ComicInfo.Summary:
If you're ready for something new -- if you're ready for the first comic of the next millennium -- you're ready for Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER! Windsor-Smith reinvigorated comics in the 1970s, and he's doing it again in this omnibus of wonder! The revolutionary, monthly, ongoing series continues with Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER #3. Not just one story, time, or place, this groundbreaking series follows three entirely different worlds, showcasing Windsor-Smith's wondrously versatile artistry and storytelling abilities. In Young Gods, skull-cracking Princess Adastra challenges Prince Heros to a duel: if he wins, he fulfills his duty by marrying her sister. But if she wins, they could embark on the most exciting adventure of their lives! In The Paradoxman, Tristan Caine begins to unravel the mystery of the Time Bike and encounters the wrath of Willy the Ape-man. And in The Freebooters, Aran Ana-Kashan eats a "happy" cookie and ends up talking to an evil wizard with a multiple personality! Get ready to get excited about comics all over again -- the STORYTELLER is here!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/barry-windsor-smith-storyteller-3/4000-43037/
ComicInfo.Title: Young Gods: Chapter Three; The Freebooters: Chapter Three; The Paradoxman: Chapter Three
